issue.title: [CF 158] 'Fake Hidden'-Option broken?
issue.body:
Updated from Version 4.0.0 Beta9 to the latest 4.0.1.4 release version today and it seems that conditons that check icons with the "Fake Hidden" option enabled are not working like the did before.

Condition checking for 'Icon Shown' seems to return allways the "last known state" of the affected Icon before it's 'fake hidden' option is marked. (Without entering the configuration menu, "last known state" ist the state of the icon uppon loggin in.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Twister | Imported from CurseForge issue #158 | Raw

comments.body:
Ahh - seems that either the curse client is slow at grabbing the latest versions, or you are damm fast at fixing issues :D
Wrote the ticket about 5 minitues ago ;)

4.0.1.4c fixed the behavior i described, so i guess you can close the ticket right away.


> Posted by CurseForge user Twister

I was doing some tests on an unrelated issue and noticed that this was happening, so I uploaded the fix right away.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
